story_99_00091/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah! I had a feeling you’d come and find me.
Now then, step right up and show us all
how strong you’ve become!
story_99_00091/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’ll be the judge of that!
And I won’t go easy on you!
story_99_00091/2401_1001_0300_10:
Total defeat?!
You’ve got some real power!
story_99_00091/2401_1001_0400_10:
Très bien! You’ve certainly earned a prize
for yourselves today. I would love for you
to have this!
story_99_00091/2401_1001_0500_10:
If you equip this, your team will be stronger
than ever! Brilliant, don’t you think?!
story_99_00091/2401_1001_0600_10:
There’s a whole range of gear out there with all
sorts of different perks. Try searching for some
the next time you go exploring!
